title: DC20 Class And Subclass Features
description: A schema for defining all features for a single class, including its core features and all of its subclass options. This structure provides full context for how features relate to each other and when they are acquired.

className.description: The name of the class this file defines.

coreFeatures.description: A list of all features available to the base class, regardless of subclass choice.

subclasses.description: A list of all available subclass options for this class.

description.description: A brief, optional description of the subclass.

features.description: A list of all features specific to this subclass.

feature.description: A reusable definition for a single feature's mechanics.

featureName.description: The name of the class feature.

levelGained.description: The character level at which this feature is acquired. This provides essential context that the high-level progression table lacks.

description.description: The main text explaining what the feature does, including its activation, cost, duration, and general effects.

isFlavor.description: True if this is a non-mechanical flavor feature.

choices.description: A list of choices the player must make for this feature.

count.description: The number of options to choose.

benefits.description: A list of distinct, named benefits or effects that are part of this feature.

effects.description: A list of formal, machine-readable effects that this benefit provides.

target.description: The path to the character sheet value to be modified (e.g., 'defenses.ad').

condition.description: A formal condition under which this effect applies (e.g., 'character.armor.type == null').
